poem:
**In the Grains of the Airwaves**  

In the age of spoken streams,   
voices crafted from zeroes and ones,  
a whisper churns the ether,   
plaiting lives beyond fiber and pulse.    

Unseen storytellers thread our ears,  
lifting mornings with news of stars,   
tales harvested from the ether-wind,  
a tapestry spun in the year  
two thousand twenty-five.
